definitions.definition: An industrial town in West Yorkshire , England , 20km south-west of Leeds .
A civil parish of Prince County , Prince Edward Island , Canada .
A regional municipality , the capital city of Nova Scotia , Canada .
A small town , the county seat of Halifax County , North Carolina , United States .
A town , the county seat of Halifax County , Virginia , United States .
An earldom in the Peerage of Great Britain .

main_definition: An industrial town in West Yorkshire , England , 20km south-west of Leeds .
secondary_definitions: A civil parish of Prince County , Prince Edward Island , Canada . [From 1765]
A regional municipality , the capital city of Nova Scotia , Canada . [From 1749]
A small town , the county seat of Halifax County , North Carolina , United States .
A town , the county seat of Halifax County , Virginia , United States .
An earldom in the Peerage of Great Britain .
